description.translate: To you, the immortal, for whom neither age nor fatigue	have any meaning. A simple rest will wipe them out.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Métilnuji eternän\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7A toi l'immortel pour qui ni l'âge, ni la fatigue\"}","{\"text\":\"§7n'ont de sens. Un simple repos les effacera.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7To you, the immortal, for whom neither age nor fatigue\"}","{\"text\":\"§7have any meaning. A simple rest will wipe them out.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HER§a2 §7DAR§a2\"}"]}}
